life_date: Valentin Popov, Ukranian, born 1956; Stephen Black, Designer; The Gordian Press, San Rafael, California, Publisher; Etchings printed by Valentin Popov, Printer, Ukranian, born 1956; Letterpress by Leda Black, Printer, American; Folio box by Booklab, Austin, Texas

signed: Signed and dated in pencil on colophon page: [Popov 96]. Each etching is signed, dated, and titled in pencil in bottom margin.
title: Torrents of Spring
